segments.text: Holly , I just heard some terrible news .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Me , too . I overheard someone say Taylor has a brain tumor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ? No , I heard that he has stomach cancer . His ex-girlfriend said it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That could explain all his stomachaches . He's trying to hide it from us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe that's why he didn't show up at the potluck . Have you seen him ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , but someone said he was in the men's room puking . Follow me !
segments.speaker: S2
